PowerPlants
a KICKSTARTER project

Discover why our game ought to be your choice!

Would you learn more how things are going on with our project? Watch our video and join our team!

Cycle through our pledges

War stamp (£5)

Support the project. Subscribe to our mailing list and get known about the most latest news.

Join the army (£20)

Early Bird version (200 available pledges). Join to the army so as to help to defeat the hostile forces. Order the production release in advance.

Join the army (£30)

Join to the army so as to help to defeat the hostile forces. Order the production release in advance.

Become an officer (£35)

The motherland requires officers. Join us to lead your comrades. Order the game and access our private pre-release tester forum in order to learn more about the current progress and add your feedbacks or have your votes.

Are you a hero? (£40)

Aid your platoons on the battlefield and explore the enemy further.You get all the previous bonuses above and take the opportunity to be a member of our test team. If you apply you will receive the most latest releases once it has been out, so will you have the option to add your comments, hints and ideas for consideration. Thus, you could be among the firsts who test the game and the development process could be impacted by your feedbacks.

Be an intelligence agent (£50)

If you feel that you are one of them, you should join us and make history. Not only do you get all the bonuses above, your name will be display on among the credits.

Be an engineer (£200)

20 available pledges. Destroy or build in the name of our nation! By applying for our limited offer, you will be able to design your individual mission, which would be attached to the production release.

Join the staff (£500)

5 available pledges. Join to the generals and plan our victory. You get all the previous bonuses above, aside from our "be an engineer" offer. You get entry to the VIP section of our forum. We also provide that your feedbacks are always being taken into consideration in order to your ideas could be realised and built in the game. Furthermore, you will be able to design an hostile character that will be added to the production version of the game.
